data.comment: In the minute -1, 2000 spectators have come along to watch today.
The match has started.
Graham Scott signals a Arsenal throw-in in Burnley's half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
Can Burnley get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
Free kick for Arsenal in the half of Burnley.
In the minute 4, Graham Scott signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
Arsenal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Arsenal to take a throw-in in Burnley territory.
In the minute 9, Burnley's Jay Rodriguez is whistled for offside at Emirates Stadium.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Ball goes out of play for a Burnley goal kick.
In the minute 12, Arsenal drive upfield and Bukayo Saka gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Burnley defender.
Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Arsenal) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
In the minute 12, Arsenal's Willian gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Burnley have a goal kick.
Chris Wood for Burnley gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 14, Goal kick for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
Throw-in for Burnley in the half of Arsenal.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in Burnley.
Throw-in for Burnley in their own half.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Arsenal close to the penalty box.
Hector Bellerin (Arsenal) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
In the minute 19, Can Arsenal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Burnley's half?
Can Arsenal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Burnley's half?
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
In the minute 21, In London, Rob Holding (Arsenal) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Graham Scott awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 22, Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Burnley advance rapidly upfield but Graham Scott blows for offside.
Graham Scott awards Arsenal a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Graham Scott signals a Arsenal throw-in in Burnley's half.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Burnley.
In the minute 26, Arsenal have a goal kick.
Alexandre Lacazette of Arsenal smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Arsenal's Gabriel Magalhaes misses with an attempt on goal.
Graham Scott awards Burnley a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Burnley in their own half.
Graham Scott blows against Burnley's Robbie Brady for offside.
Burnley awarded a free kick in their own half.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Robbie Brady (Burnley) has received a yellow card from Graham Scott.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Burnley at Emirates Stadium.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Arsenal.
Free kick Burnley.
In the minute 39, Goal kick for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
Arsenal drive forward but Bukayo Saka is judged offside.
Jay Rodriguez (Burnley) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Arsenal are pushing forward but Gabriel Magalhaes's finish is wide of the goal.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to James Tarkowski for Burnley who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 45, James Tarkowski is back on his feet again.
Arsenal to take a throw-in in Burnley territory.
Graham Scott will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Arsenal drive upfield and Bukayo Saka gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Burnley defender.
Arsenal to take a throw-in in Burnley territory.
The first-half is over at Emirates Stadium.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Throw-in Burnley.
In the minute 47, Willian for the home team is judged to be offside.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Burnley.
In the minute 50, In London Arsenal drive forward through Kieran Tierney. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Arsenal's Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang gets in a shot on goal at Emirates Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Arsenal's Bukayo Saka is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 52, Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
Throw-in high up the field for Arsenal in London.
Graham Scott signals a Arsenal throw-in in Burnley's half.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Arsenal in the half of Burnley.
Arsenal's Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Burnley defender.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Arsenal push forward at Emirates Stadium and Willian gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Burnley defence.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Burnley in their own half.
In the minute 58, Granit Xhaka (Arsenal) has been shown a straight red card by referee Graham Scott.
James Tarkowski (Burnley) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Sean Dyche (Burnley) is making a first substitution, with Ashley Barnes replacing Jay Rodriguez.
In the minute 60, Burnley have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
Burnley's Ben Mee breaks free at Emirates Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
Can Arsenal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Burnley's half?
In the minute 61, The home team replace Alexandre Lacazette with Dani Ceballos.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 62, Graham Scott awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Burnley is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Burnley awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Arsenal pushes forward through Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Arsenal have a dangerous throw-in.
Ben Mee gets his shot on target but fails to score for Burnley.
In the minute 67, Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
Graham Scott signals a Arsenal throw-in in Burnley's half.
In London Arsenal's Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang is caught offside.
In the minute 69, Ashley Barnes of Burnley gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
Matej Vydra is replacing Chris Wood for Burnley at Emirates Stadium.
In the minute 71, Free kick in a good position for Burnley!
At Emirates Stadium, Hector Bellerin has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Burnley.
Mohamed Elneny (Arsenal) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Own goal! Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang scores in his own net to make it 0-1.
Ainsley Maitland-Niles is replacing Hector Bellerin for the home team.
In the minute 75, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Burnley in their own half.
Throw-in Arsenal.
In the minute 76, Can Burnley capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In London Burnley attack through Josh Brownhill. The finish is off target, however.
Important block from the Arsenal defence as Josh Brownhill fires in a strike for Burnley.
In the minute 77, Charlie Taylor (Burnley) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Burnley have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
Burnley's James Tarkowski misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 78, Arsenal have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Burnley.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
In the minute 81, Graham Scott signals a throw-in for Burnley, close to Arsenal's area.
Burnley needs to be cautious. Arsenal have an attacking throw-in.
Arsenal's Gabriel Magalhaes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 82, Graham Scott awards Burnley a goal kick.
Edward Nketiah is on a sub for Willian for Arsenal.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Burnley in the half of Arsenal.
Bukayo Saka (Arsenal) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
In the minute 87, Can Arsenal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Burnley's half?
Arsenal to take a throw-in in Burnley territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Burnley at Emirates Stadium.
Matej Vydra for Burnley drives towards goal at Emirates Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Arsenal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rob Holding (Arsenal) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick Arsenal.
Gabriel Magalhaes for Arsenal drives towards goal at Emirates Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Burnley's James Tarkowski is back in action after a slight knock.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
Arsenal to take a throw-in in Burnley territory.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
Arsenal's Rob Holding gets in a shot on goal at Emirates Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Full-time! The final score is 0-1.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured James Tarkowski.
